text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to specify reporting duties, including annual accounting and possible intermediate reports requested by the judge. Section 4.2, under 'Core duties,' explicitly lists: 'File an annual report (*relazione annuale*) to the judge' and 'Submit a *verbale di rendicontazione* (accounting statement) within 30 days of the annual report'. Step 9 in Section 5 also details filing the first annual report. This fully satisfies the requirement.", "criterion_id": "af511f1f-8ba3-4788-9ef1-2199e1f7ccd0"}
